title: 2009/249/EC: Council Decision of 16 March 2009 appointing the Chairperson of the European Statistical Governance Advisory Board
header:
20.3.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 74/30
COUNCIL DECISION
of 16 March 2009
appointing the Chairperson of the European Statistical Governance Advisory Board
(2009/249/EC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to Decision No 235/2008/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 11 March 2008 establishing the European Statistical Governance Advisory Board (1), and in particular Article 3 thereof,
Having regard to the opinion of the Commission,
Having regard to the approval of the European Parliament,
main_body: Mr Johnny ÅKERHOLM is hereby appointed Chairperson of the European Statistical Governance Advisory Board for a period of three years.
This Decision shall take effect on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 16 March 2009.
For the Council
The President
A. VONDRA
(1)  OJ L 73, 15.3.2008, p. 17.
